00091 Ecode_t SPIDRV_Init( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle, SPIDRV_Init_t *initData )
00092 {
00093   Ecode_t retVal;
00094   USART_InitSync_TypeDef usartInit = USART_INITSYNC_DEFAULT;
00095 
00096   if ( handle == NULL )
00097   {
00098     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00099   }
00100 
00101   if ( initData == NULL )
00102   {
00103     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00104   }
00105 
00106   memset( handle, 0, sizeof( SPIDRV_HandleData_t ) );
00107 
00108   if ( 0 )
00109   {
00110 #if defined( USART0 )
00111   }
00112   else if ( initData->port == USART0 )
00113   {
00114     handle->usartClock  = cmuClock_USART0;
00115     handle->txDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART0_TXBL;
00116     handle->rxDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART0_RXDATAV;
00117 #endif
00118 #if defined( USART1 )
00119   }
00120   else if ( initData->port == USART1 )
00121   {
00122     handle->usartClock  = cmuClock_USART1;
00123     handle->txDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART1_TXBL;
00124     handle->rxDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART1_RXDATAV;
00125 #endif
00126 #if defined( USART2 )
00127   }
00128   else if ( initData->port == USART2 )
00129   {
00130     handle->usartClock  = cmuClock_USART2;
00131     handle->txDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART2_TXBL;
00132     handle->rxDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USART2_RXDATAV;
00133 #endif
00134 #if defined( USARTRF0 )
00135   }
00136   else if ( initData->port == USARTRF0 )
00137   {
00138     handle->usartClock  = cmuClock_USARTRF0;
00139     handle->txDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USARTRF0_TXBL;
00140     handle->rxDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USARTRF0_RXDATAV;
00141 #endif
00142 #if defined( USARTRF1 )
00143   }
00144   else if ( initData->port == USARTRF1 )
00145   {
00146     handle->usartClock  = cmuClock_USARTRF1;
00147     handle->txDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USARTRF1_TXBL;
00148     handle->rxDMASignal = dmadrvPeripheralSignal_USARTRF1_RXDATAV;
00149 #endif
00150   }
00151   else
00152   {
00153     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00154   }
00155 
00156   handle->initData = *initData;
00157 
00158   if ( initData->bitOrder == spidrvBitOrderMsbFirst )
00159   {
00160     usartInit.msbf = true;
00161   }
00162 
00163   if ( initData->clockMode == spidrvClockMode0 )
00164   {
00165     usartInit.clockMode = usartClockMode0;
00166   }
00167   else if ( initData->clockMode == spidrvClockMode1 )
00168   {
00169     usartInit.clockMode = usartClockMode1;
00170   }
00171   else if ( initData->clockMode == spidrvClockMode2 )
00172   {
00173     usartInit.clockMode = usartClockMode2;
00174   }
00175   else if ( initData->clockMode == spidrvClockMode3 )
00176   {
00177     usartInit.clockMode = usartClockMode3;
00178   }
00179   else
00180   {
00181     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00182   }
00183 
00184   if ( initData->type == spidrvSlave )
00185   {
00186     usartInit.master = false;
00187     usartInit.baudrate = 1000;      // Dummy value needed by USART_InitSync()
00188   }
00189   else
00190   {
00191     usartInit.baudrate = initData->bitRate;
00192   }
00193 
00194   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_HFPER, true );
00195   CMU_ClockEnable( cmuClock_GPIO, true );
00196   CMU_ClockEnable( handle->usartClock, true );
00197   USART_InitSync(  initData->port, &usartInit );
00198 
00199   if ( ( initData->type == spidrvMaster )
00200        && ( initData->csControl == spidrvCsControlAuto ) )
00201   {
00202     initData->port->CTRL |= USART_CTRL_AUTOCS;
00203   }
00204 
00205   if ( initData->csControl == spidrvCsControlAuto )
00206   {
00207     // SPI 4 wire mode
00208 #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN )
00209     initData->port->ROUTEPEN = USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN
00210                                | USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN
00211                                | USART_ROUTEPEN_CLKPEN
00212                                | USART_ROUTEPEN_CSPEN;
00213 
00214     initData->port->ROUTELOC0 = ( initData->port->ROUTELOC0 &
00215                                   ~( _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_MASK
00216                                      | _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_MASK
00217                                      | _USART_ROUTELOC0_CLKLOC_MASK
00218                                      | _USART_ROUTELOC0_CSLOC_MASK ) )
00219                                 | ( initData->portLocationTx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_SHIFT  )
00220                                 | ( initData->portLocationRx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_SHIFT  )
00221                                 | ( initData->portLocationClk << _USART_ROUTELOC0_CLKLOC_SHIFT )
00222                                 | ( initData->portLocationCs  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_CSLOC_SHIFT  );
00223 #else
00224     initData->port->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_TXPEN
00225                             | USART_ROUTE_RXPEN
00226                             | USART_ROUTE_CLKPEN
00227                             | USART_ROUTE_CSPEN
00228                             | (initData->portLocation
00229                               << _USART_ROUTE_LOCATION_SHIFT );
00230 #endif
00231   }
00232   else
00233   {
00234     // SPI 3 wire mode
00235 #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN )
00236     initData->port->ROUTEPEN = USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN
00237                                | USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN
00238                                | USART_ROUTEPEN_CLKPEN;
00239 
00240     initData->port->ROUTELOC0 = ( initData->port->ROUTELOC0 &
00241                                   ~( _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_MASK
00242                                      | _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_MASK
00243                                      | _USART_ROUTELOC0_CLKLOC_MASK ) )
00244                                 | ( initData->portLocationTx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_SHIFT  )
00245                                 | ( initData->portLocationRx  << _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_SHIFT  )
00246                                 | ( initData->portLocationClk << _USART_ROUTELOC0_CLKLOC_SHIFT );
00247 #else
00248     initData->port->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_TXPEN
00249                             | USART_ROUTE_RXPEN
00250                             | USART_ROUTE_CLKPEN
00251                             | (initData->portLocation
00252                               << _USART_ROUTE_LOCATION_SHIFT );
00253 #endif
00254   }
00255 
00256   if ( ( retVal = ConfigGPIO( handle, true ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00257   {
00258     return retVal;
00259   }
00260 
00261   INT_Disable();
00262   if ( ! spidrvIsInitialized )
00263   {
00264     spidrvIsInitialized = true;
00265     INT_Enable();
00266 
00267 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
00268     RTCDRV_Init();
00269 #endif
00270   }
00271   else
00272   {
00273     INT_Enable();
00274   }
00275 
00276 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
00277   if ( initData->type == spidrvSlave )
00278   {
00279     if ( RTCDRV_AllocateTimer( &handle->timer ) != ECODE_EMDRV_RTCDRV_OK )
00280     {
00281       return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_TIMER_ALLOC_ERROR;
00282     }
00283   }
00284 #endif
00285 
00286   // Initialize DMA.
00287   DMADRV_Init();
00288 
00289   if ( DMADRV_AllocateChannel(&handle->txDMACh,NULL) != ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK )
00290   {
00291     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_DMA_ALLOC_ERROR;
00292   }
00293 
00294   if ( DMADRV_AllocateChannel(&handle->rxDMACh,NULL) != ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK )
00295   {
00296     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_DMA_ALLOC_ERROR;
00297   }
00298 
00299   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00300 }

00302 /***************************************************************************/
00312 Ecode_t SPIDRV_DeInit( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle )
00313 {
00314   if ( handle == NULL )
00315   {
00316     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00317   }
00318 
00319   // Stop DMA's.
00320   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->rxDMACh );
00321   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->txDMACh );
00322 
00323   ConfigGPIO( handle, false );
00324 
00325 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
00326   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00327   {
00328     RTCDRV_StopTimer( handle->timer );
00329     RTCDRV_FreeTimer( handle->timer );
00330   }
00331 #endif
00332 
00333   USART_Reset( handle->initData.port );
00334   CMU_ClockEnable( handle->usartClock, false );
00335 
00336   DMADRV_FreeChannel( handle->txDMACh );
00337   DMADRV_FreeChannel( handle->rxDMACh );
00338   DMADRV_DeInit();
00339 
00340   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00341 }

00343 /***************************************************************************/
00353 Ecode_t SPIDRV_AbortTransfer( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle )
00354 {
00355   if ( handle == NULL )
00356   {
00357     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00358   }
00359 
00360   INT_Disable();
00361   if ( handle->state == spidrvStateIdle )
00362   {
00363     INT_Enable();
00364     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_IDLE;
00365   }
00366 
00367 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
00368   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00369   {
00370     RTCDRV_StopTimer( handle->timer );
00371   }
00372 #endif
00373 
00374   // Stop DMA's.
00375   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->rxDMACh );
00376   DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->txDMACh );
00377   DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->rxDMACh, &handle->remaining );
00378   handle->transferStatus    = ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ABORTED;
00379   handle->state             = spidrvStateIdle;
00380   handle->transferStatus    = ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ABORTED;
00381   handle->blockingCompleted = true;
00382 
00383   if ( handle->userCallback != NULL )
00384   {
00385     handle->userCallback( handle,
00386                           ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ABORTED,
00387                           handle->transferCount - handle->remaining );
00388   }
00389   INT_Enable();
00390 
00391   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00392 }

00406 Ecode_t SPIDRV_GetBitrate( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle, uint32_t *bitRate )
00407 {
00408   if ( handle == NULL )
00409   {
00410     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;

00412

00414   {
00415     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;

00417 
00418   *bitRate = USART_BaudrateGet( handle->initData.port );
00419 
00420   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;

00452 /***************************************************************************/
00470 Ecode_t SPIDRV_GetTransferStatus( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00471                                   int *itemsTransferred,
00472                                   int *itemsRemaining )
00473 {
00474   int remaining;
00475 
00476   if ( handle == NULL )
00477   {
00478     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00479   }
00480 
00481   if ( ( itemsTransferred == NULL ) || ( itemsRemaining == NULL ) )
00482   {
00483     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00484   }
00485 
00486   INT_Disable();
00487   if ( handle->state == spidrvStateIdle )
00488   {
00489     remaining = handle->remaining;
00490   }
00491   else
00492   {
00493     DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->rxDMACh, &remaining );
00494   }
00495   INT_Enable();
00496 
00497   *itemsTransferred = handle->transferCount - remaining;
00498   *itemsRemaining   = remaining;
00499 
00500   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00501 }

00503 /***************************************************************************/
00522 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MReceive( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00523                          void *buffer,
00524                          int count,
00525                          SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )
00526 {
00527   Ecode_t retVal;
00528 
00529   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00530   {
00531     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00532   }
00533 
00534   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiPrologue( handle, buffer, count ) )
00535        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00536   {
00537     return retVal;
00538   }
00539 
00540   StartReceiveDMA( handle, buffer, count, callback );
00541 
00542   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00543 }
00544 
00545 /***************************************************************************/
00565 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MReceiveB( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00566                           void *buffer,
00567                           int count )
00568 {
00569   Ecode_t retVal;
00570 
00571   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00572   {
00573     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00574   }
00575 
00576   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiBlockingPrologue( handle, buffer, count ) )
00577        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00578   {
00579     return retVal;
00580   }
00581 
00582   StartReceiveDMA( handle, buffer, count, BlockingComplete );
00583 
00584   WaitForTransferCompletion( handle );
00585 
00586   return handle->transferStatus;
00587 }

00589 /***************************************************************************/
00607 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MTransfer( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00608                           const void *txBuffer,
00609                           void *rxBuffer,
00610                           int count,
00611                           SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )
00612 {
00613   Ecode_t retVal;
00614 
00615   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00616   {
00617     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00618   }
00619 
00620   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiPrologue( handle, (void*)txBuffer, count ) )
00621        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00622   {
00623     return retVal;
00624   }
00625 
00626   if ( rxBuffer == NULL )
00627   {
00628     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00629   }
00630 
00631   StartTransferDMA( handle, txBuffer, rxBuffer, count, callback );
00632 
00633   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00634 }

00657 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MTransferB( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00658                            const void *txBuffer,
00659                            void *rxBuffer,
00660                            int count )
00661 {
00662   Ecode_t retVal;
00663 
00664   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00665   {
00666     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00667   }

00669   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiBlockingPrologue( handle, (void*)txBuffer, count ))
00670        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00671   {
00672     return retVal;
00673   }
00674 
00675   if ( rxBuffer == NULL )
00676   {
00677     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00678   }
00679 
00680   StartTransferDMA( handle, txBuffer, rxBuffer, count, BlockingComplete );
00681 
00682   WaitForTransferCompletion( handle );
00683 
00684   return handle->transferStatus;
00685 }

00687 /***************************************************************************/
00706 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MTransferSingleItemB( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00707                                      uint32_t txValue,
00708                                      void *rxValue )
00709 {
00710   void *pRx;
00711   uint32_t rxBuffer;
00712 
00713   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
00714   {
00715     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00716   }
00717 
00718   if ( handle == NULL )
00719   {
00720     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00721   }
00722 
00723   INT_Disable();
00724   if ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle )
00725   {
00726     INT_Enable();
00727     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_BUSY;
00728   }
00729   handle->state = spidrvStateTransferring;
00730   INT_Enable();
00731 
00732   if ( ( pRx = rxValue ) == NULL )
00733   {
00734     pRx = &rxBuffer;
00735   }
00736 
00737   StartTransferDMA( handle, &txValue, pRx, 1, BlockingComplete );
00738 
00739   WaitForTransferCompletion( handle );
00740 
00741   return handle->transferStatus;
00742 }
00743

00763 Ecode_t SPIDRV_MTransmit( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00764                           const void *buffer,
00765                           int count,
00766                           SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )

00771   {
00772     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00773   }
00774 
00775   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiPrologue( handle, (void*)buffer, count ) )
00776        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00777   {
00778     return retVal;
00779   }
00780 
00781   StartTransmitDMA( handle, buffer, count, callback );
00782 
00783   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00784 }

00841 Ecode_t SPIDRV_SetBitrate( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle, uint32_t bitRate )
00842 {
00843   if ( handle == NULL )
00844   {
00845     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00846   }
00847 
00848   INT_Disable();
00849   if ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle )
00850   {
00851     INT_Enable();
00852     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_BUSY;
00853   }
00854 
00855   handle->initData.bitRate = bitRate;
00856   USART_BaudrateSyncSet( handle->initData.port, 0, bitRate );
00857   INT_Enable();
00858 
00859   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00860 }

00862 /***************************************************************************/
00874 Ecode_t SPIDRV_SetFramelength( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle, uint32_t frameLength )
00875 {
00876   if ( handle == NULL )
00877   {
00878     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
00879   }
00880 
00881   frameLength -= 3;
00882   if ( ( frameLength < _USART_FRAME_DATABITS_FOUR )
00883        || ( frameLength > _USART_FRAME_DATABITS_SIXTEEN ) )
00884   {
00885     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
00886   }
00887 
00888   INT_Disable();
00889   if ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle )
00890   {
00891     INT_Enable();
00892     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_BUSY;
00893   }
00894 
00895   handle->initData.frameLength = frameLength + 3;
00896   handle->initData.port->FRAME = ( handle->initData.port->FRAME
00897                                    & ~_USART_FRAME_DATABITS_MASK )
00898                                   | ( frameLength
00899                                       << _USART_FRAME_DATABITS_SHIFT );
00900   INT_Enable();
00901 
00902   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00903 }
00904 
00905 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
00906 /***************************************************************************/
00927 Ecode_t SPIDRV_SReceive( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00928                          void *buffer,
00929                          int count,
00930                          SPIDRV_Callback_t callback,
00931                          int timeoutMs )
00932 {
00933   Ecode_t retVal;
00934 
00935   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvMaster )
00936   {
00937     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
00938   }
00939 
00940   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiPrologue( handle, buffer, count ) )
00941        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00942   {
00943     return retVal;
00944   }
00945 
00946   if ( timeoutMs )
00947   {
00948     RTCDRV_StartTimer( handle->timer,
00949                        rtcdrvTimerTypeOneshot,
00950                        timeoutMs,
00951                        SlaveTimeout,
00952                        handle );
00953   }
00954 
00955   if ( handle->initData.slaveStartMode == spidrvSlaveStartDelayed )
00956   {
00957     if ( ( retVal = WaitForIdleLine( handle ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
00958     {
00959       return retVal;
00960     }
00961   }
00962 
00963   StartReceiveDMA( handle, buffer, count, callback );
00964 
00965   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
00966 }
00967 
00968 /***************************************************************************/
00991 Ecode_t SPIDRV_SReceiveB( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
00992                           void *buffer,
00993                           int count,
00994                           int timeoutMs )
00995 {
00996   Ecode_t retVal;
00997 
00998   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvMaster )
00999   {
01000     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
01001   }
01002 
01003   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiBlockingPrologue( handle, buffer, count ) )
01004        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01005   {
01006     return retVal;
01007   }
01008 
01009   if ( timeoutMs )
01010   {
01011     RTCDRV_StartTimer( handle->timer,
01012                        rtcdrvTimerTypeOneshot,
01013                        timeoutMs,
01014                        SlaveTimeout,
01015                        handle );
01016   }
01017 
01018   if ( handle->initData.slaveStartMode == spidrvSlaveStartDelayed )
01019   {
01020     if ( ( retVal = WaitForIdleLine( handle ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01021     {
01022       return retVal;
01023     }
01024   }
01025 
01026   StartReceiveDMA( handle, buffer, count, BlockingComplete );
01027 
01028   WaitForTransferCompletion( handle );
01029 
01030   return handle->transferStatus;
01031 }
01032 
01033 /***************************************************************************/
01053 Ecode_t SPIDRV_STransfer( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01054                           const void *txBuffer,
01055                           void *rxBuffer,
01056                           int count,
01057                           SPIDRV_Callback_t callback,
01058                           int timeoutMs )
01059 {
01060   Ecode_t retVal;
01061 
01062   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvMaster )
01063   {
01064     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
01065   }
01066 
01067   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiPrologue( handle, (void*)txBuffer, count ) )
01068        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01069   {
01070     return retVal;
01071   }
01072 
01073   if ( rxBuffer == NULL )
01074   {
01075     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01076   }
01077 
01078   if ( timeoutMs )
01079   {
01080     RTCDRV_StartTimer( handle->timer,
01081                        rtcdrvTimerTypeOneshot,
01082                        timeoutMs,
01083                        SlaveTimeout,
01084                        handle );
01085   }
01086 
01087   if ( handle->initData.slaveStartMode == spidrvSlaveStartDelayed )
01088   {
01089     if ( ( retVal = WaitForIdleLine( handle ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01090     {
01091       return retVal;
01092     }
01093   }
01094 
01095   StartTransferDMA( handle, txBuffer, rxBuffer, count, callback );
01096 
01097   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01098 }
01099 
01100 /***************************************************************************/
01124 Ecode_t SPIDRV_STransferB( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01125                            const void *txBuffer,
01126                            void *rxBuffer,
01127                            int count,
01128                            int timeoutMs )
01129 {
01130   Ecode_t retVal;
01131 
01132   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvMaster )
01133   {
01134     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;
01135   }
01136 
01137   if ( ( retVal = TransferApiBlockingPrologue( handle, (void*)txBuffer, count ))
01138        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01139   {
01140     return retVal;
01141   }
01142 
01143   if ( rxBuffer == NULL )
01144   {
01145     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01146   }
01147 
01148   if ( timeoutMs )
01149   {
01150     RTCDRV_StartTimer( handle->timer,
01151                        rtcdrvTimerTypeOneshot,
01152                        timeoutMs,
01153                        SlaveTimeout,
01154                        handle );
01155   }
01156 
01157   if ( handle->initData.slaveStartMode == spidrvSlaveStartDelayed )
01158   {
01159     if ( ( retVal = WaitForIdleLine( handle ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01160     {
01161       return retVal;
01162     }
01163   }
01164 
01165   StartTransferDMA( handle, txBuffer, rxBuffer, count, BlockingComplete );
01166 
01167   WaitForTransferCompletion( handle );
01168 
01169   return handle->transferStatus;
01170 }
01171 
01172 /***************************************************************************/

01195                           int count,

01197                           int timeoutMs )

01202   {
01203     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;

01205

01207        != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01208   {
01209     return retVal;
01210   }
01211 
01212   if ( timeoutMs )
01213   {
01214     RTCDRV_StartTimer( handle->timer,
01215                        rtcdrvTimerTypeOneshot,
01216                        timeoutMs,
01217                        SlaveTimeout,
01218                        handle );
01219   }
01220 
01221   if ( handle->initData.slaveStartMode == spidrvSlaveStartDelayed )
01222   {
01223     if ( ( retVal = WaitForIdleLine( handle ) ) != ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK )
01224     {
01225       return retVal;
01226     }
01227   }

01266     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_MODE_ERROR;

01302 /***************************************************************************/
01308 static void BlockingComplete( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01309                               Ecode_t transferStatus,
01310                               int itemsTransferred )
01311 {
01312   (void)itemsTransferred;

01314   handle->transferStatus    = transferStatus;
01315   handle->blockingCompleted = true;
01316 }

01318 /***************************************************************************/
01321 static Ecode_t ConfigGPIO( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle, bool enable )
01322 {
01323 #if defined( _USART_ROUTELOC0_MASK )
01324   SPIDRV_Init_t *initData;
01325 #else
01326   uint32_t location;
01327 #endif
01328   int mosiPin, misoPin, clkPin;
01329   int mosiPort, misoPort, clkPort;
01330 
01331 #if defined( _USART_ROUTELOC0_MASK )
01332   initData = &handle->initData;
01333 
01334   if ( 0 )
01335   {
01336 #if defined( USART0 )
01337   }
01338   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART0 )
01339   {
01340     mosiPort       = AF_USART0_TX_PORT(  initData->portLocationTx  );
01341     misoPort       = AF_USART0_RX_PORT(  initData->portLocationRx  );
01342     clkPort        = AF_USART0_CLK_PORT( initData->portLocationClk );
01343     handle->csPort = AF_USART0_CS_PORT(  initData->portLocationCs  );
01344     mosiPin        = AF_USART0_TX_PIN(   initData->portLocationTx  );
01345     misoPin        = AF_USART0_RX_PIN(   initData->portLocationRx  );
01346     clkPin         = AF_USART0_CLK_PIN(  initData->portLocationClk );
01347     handle->csPin  = AF_USART0_CS_PIN(   initData->portLocationCs  );
01348 #endif
01349 #if defined( USART1 )
01350   }
01351   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART1 )
01352   {
01353     mosiPort       = AF_USART1_TX_PORT(  initData->portLocationTx  );
01354     misoPort       = AF_USART1_RX_PORT(  initData->portLocationRx  );
01355     clkPort        = AF_USART1_CLK_PORT( initData->portLocationClk );
01356     handle->csPort = AF_USART1_CS_PORT(  initData->portLocationCs  );
01357     mosiPin        = AF_USART1_TX_PIN(   initData->portLocationTx  );
01358     misoPin        = AF_USART1_RX_PIN(   initData->portLocationRx  );
01359     clkPin         = AF_USART1_CLK_PIN(  initData->portLocationClk );
01360     handle->csPin  = AF_USART1_CS_PIN(   initData->portLocationCs  );
01361 #endif
01362 #if defined( USART2 )
01363   }
01364   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART2 )
01365   {
01366     mosiPort       = AF_USART2_TX_PORT(  initData->portLocationTx  );
01367     misoPort       = AF_USART2_RX_PORT(  initData->portLocationRx  );
01368     clkPort        = AF_USART2_CLK_PORT( initData->portLocationClk );
01369     handle->csPort = AF_USART2_CS_PORT(  initData->portLocationCs  );
01370     mosiPin        = AF_USART2_TX_PIN(   initData->portLocationTx  );
01371     misoPin        = AF_USART2_RX_PIN(   initData->portLocationRx  );
01372     clkPin         = AF_USART2_CLK_PIN(  initData->portLocationClk );
01373     handle->csPin  = AF_USART2_CS_PIN(   initData->portLocationCs  );
01374 #endif
01375 #if defined( USARTRF0 )
01376   }
01377   else if ( handle->initData.port == USARTRF0 )
01378   {
01379     mosiPort       = AF_USARTRF0_TX_PORT(  initData->portLocationTx  );
01380     misoPort       = AF_USARTRF0_RX_PORT(  initData->portLocationRx  );
01381     clkPort        = AF_USARTRF0_CLK_PORT( initData->portLocationClk );
01382     handle->csPort = AF_USARTRF0_CS_PORT(  initData->portLocationCs  );
01383     mosiPin        = AF_USARTRF0_TX_PIN(   initData->portLocationTx  );
01384     misoPin        = AF_USARTRF0_RX_PIN(   initData->portLocationRx  );
01385     clkPin         = AF_USARTRF0_CLK_PIN(  initData->portLocationClk );
01386     handle->csPin  = AF_USARTRF0_CS_PIN(   initData->portLocationCs  );
01387 #endif
01388 #if defined( USARTRF1 )
01389   }
01390   else if ( handle->initData.port == USARTRF1 )
01391   {
01392     mosiPort       = AF_USARTRF1_TX_PORT(  initData->portLocationTx  );
01393     misoPort       = AF_USARTRF1_RX_PORT(  initData->portLocationRx  );
01394     clkPort        = AF_USARTRF1_CLK_PORT( initData->portLocationClk );
01395     handle->csPort = AF_USARTRF1_CS_PORT(  initData->portLocationCs  );
01396     mosiPin        = AF_USARTRF1_TX_PIN(   initData->portLocationTx  );
01397     misoPin        = AF_USARTRF1_RX_PIN(   initData->portLocationRx  );
01398     clkPin         = AF_USARTRF1_CLK_PIN(  initData->portLocationClk );
01399     handle->csPin  = AF_USARTRF1_CS_PIN(   initData->portLocationCs  );
01400 #endif
01401   }
01402   else
01403   {
01404     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01405   }
01406 
01407 #else
01408   location = handle->initData.portLocation;
01409 
01410   if ( 0 )
01411   {
01412 #if defined( USART0 )
01413   }
01414   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART0 )
01415   {
01416     mosiPort       = AF_USART0_TX_PORT(  location );
01417     misoPort       = AF_USART0_RX_PORT(  location );
01418     clkPort        = AF_USART0_CLK_PORT( location );
01419     handle->csPort = AF_USART0_CS_PORT(  location );
01420     mosiPin        = AF_USART0_TX_PIN(   location );
01421     misoPin        = AF_USART0_RX_PIN(   location );
01422     clkPin         = AF_USART0_CLK_PIN(  location );
01423     handle->csPin  = AF_USART0_CS_PIN(   location );
01424 #endif
01425 #if defined( USART1 )
01426   }
01427   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART1 )
01428   {
01429     mosiPort       = AF_USART1_TX_PORT(  location );
01430     misoPort       = AF_USART1_RX_PORT(  location );
01431     clkPort        = AF_USART1_CLK_PORT( location );
01432     handle->csPort = AF_USART1_CS_PORT(  location );
01433     mosiPin        = AF_USART1_TX_PIN(   location );
01434     misoPin        = AF_USART1_RX_PIN(   location );
01435     clkPin         = AF_USART1_CLK_PIN(  location );
01436     handle->csPin  = AF_USART1_CS_PIN(   location );
01437 #endif
01438 #if defined( USART2 )
01439   }
01440   else if ( handle->initData.port == USART2 )
01441   {
01442     mosiPort       = AF_USART2_TX_PORT(  location );
01443     misoPort       = AF_USART2_RX_PORT(  location );
01444     clkPort        = AF_USART2_CLK_PORT( location );
01445     handle->csPort = AF_USART2_CS_PORT(  location );
01446     mosiPin        = AF_USART2_TX_PIN(   location );
01447     misoPin        = AF_USART2_RX_PIN(   location );
01448     clkPin         = AF_USART2_CLK_PIN(  location );
01449     handle->csPin  = AF_USART2_CS_PIN(   location );
01450 #endif
01451 #if defined( USARTRF0 )
01452   }
01453   else if ( handle->initData.port == USARTRF0 )
01454   {
01455     mosiPort       = AF_USARTRF0_TX_PORT(  location );
01456     misoPort       = AF_USARTRF0_RX_PORT(  location );
01457     clkPort        = AF_USARTRF0_CLK_PORT( location );
01458     handle->csPort = AF_USARTRF0_CS_PORT(  location );
01459     mosiPin        = AF_USARTRF0_TX_PIN(   location );
01460     misoPin        = AF_USARTRF0_RX_PIN(   location );
01461     clkPin         = AF_USARTRF0_CLK_PIN(  location );
01462     handle->csPin  = AF_USARTRF0_CS_PIN(   location );
01463 #endif
01464 #if defined( USARTRF1 )
01465   }
01466   else if ( handle->initData.port == USARTRF1 )
01467   {
01468     mosiPort       = AF_USARTRF1_TX_PORT(  location );
01469     misoPort       = AF_USARTRF1_RX_PORT(  location );
01470     clkPort        = AF_USARTRF1_CLK_PORT( location );
01471     handle->csPort = AF_USARTRF1_CS_PORT(  location );
01472     mosiPin        = AF_USARTRF1_TX_PIN(   location );
01473     misoPin        = AF_USARTRF1_RX_PIN(   location );
01474     clkPin         = AF_USARTRF1_CLK_PIN(  location );
01475     handle->csPin  = AF_USARTRF1_CS_PIN(   location );
01476 #endif
01477   }
01478   else
01479   {
01480     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01481   }
01482 #endif
01483 
01484   if ( enable )
01485   {
01486     if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvMaster )
01487     {
01488       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)mosiPort, mosiPin,
01489                        gpioModePushPull, 0 );
01490       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)misoPort, misoPin,
01491                        gpioModeInputPull, 0 );
01492 
01493       if (    ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode0 )
01494            || ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode1 ) )
01495       {
01496         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin,
01497                          gpioModePushPull, 0 );
01498       }
01499       else
01500       {
01501         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin,
01502                          gpioModePushPull, 1 );
01503       }
01504 
01505       if ( handle->initData.csControl == spidrvCsControlAuto )
01506       {
01507         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)handle->csPort, handle->csPin,
01508                          gpioModePushPull, 1 );
01509       }
01510     }
01511     else
01512     {
01513       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)mosiPort, mosiPin,
01514                        gpioModeInputPull, 0 );
01515       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)misoPort, misoPin,
01516                        gpioModePushPull, 0 );
01517 
01518       if (    ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode0 )
01519            || ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode1 ) )
01520       {
01521         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin,
01522                          gpioModeInputPull, 0 );
01523       }
01524       else
01525       {
01526         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin,
01527                          gpioModeInputPull, 1 );
01528       }
01529 
01530       if ( handle->initData.csControl == spidrvCsControlAuto )
01531       {
01532         GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)handle->csPort, handle->csPin,
01533                          gpioModeInputPull, 1 );
01534       }
01535     }
01536   }
01537   else
01538   {
01539     GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)mosiPort, mosiPin, gpioModeInputPull,0);
01540     GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)misoPort, misoPin, gpioModeInputPull,0);
01541 
01542     if (    ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode0 )
01543          || ( handle->initData.clockMode == spidrvClockMode1 ) )
01544     {
01545       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin, gpioModeInputPull,0);
01546     }
01547     else
01548     {
01549       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)clkPort, clkPin, gpioModeInputPull,1);
01550     }
01551 
01552     if ( handle->initData.csControl == spidrvCsControlAuto )
01553     {
01554       GPIO_PinModeSet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)handle->csPort, handle->csPin,
01555                        gpioModeDisabled, 0);
01556     }
01557   }
01558 
01559   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01560 }
01561 
01562 /***************************************************************************/
01565 static bool RxDMAComplete( unsigned int channel,
01566                            unsigned int sequenceNo,
01567                            void *userParam )
01568 {
01569   SPIDRV_Handle_t handle;
01570   (void)channel;
01571   (void)sequenceNo;
01572 
01573   INT_Disable();
01574 
01575   handle = (SPIDRV_Handle_t)userParam;
01576 
01577   handle->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01578   handle->state          = spidrvStateIdle;
01579   handle->remaining      = 0;
01580 
01581 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
01582   if ( handle->initData.type == spidrvSlave )
01583   {
01584     RTCDRV_StopTimer( handle->timer );
01585   }
01586 #endif
01587 
01588   if ( handle->userCallback != NULL )
01589   {
01590     handle->userCallback( handle, ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK, handle->transferCount);
01591   }
01592 
01593   INT_Enable();
01594   return true;
01595 }
01596 
01597 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
01598 /***************************************************************************/
01601 static void SlaveTimeout( RTCDRV_TimerID_t id, void *user )
01602 {
01603   bool active, pending;
01604   SPIDRV_Handle_t handle;
01605   (void)id;
01606 
01607   handle = (SPIDRV_Handle_t)user;
01608 
01609   if ( handle->state == spidrvStateTransferring )
01610   {
01611     DMADRV_TransferActive( handle->rxDMACh, &active );
01612     if ( active )
01613     {
01614       // Stop running DMA's
01615       DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->rxDMACh );
01616       DMADRV_StopTransfer( handle->txDMACh );
01617       DMADRV_TransferRemainingCount( handle->rxDMACh, &handle->remaining );
01618     }
01619     else
01620     {
01621       // DMA is either completed or not yet started
01622       DMADRV_TransferCompletePending( handle->txDMACh, &pending );
01623       if ( pending )
01624       {
01625           // We have a pending DMA interrupt, let the DMA handler do the rest
01626           return;
01627       }
01628       handle->remaining = handle->transferCount;
01629     }
01630     handle->transferStatus = ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_TIMEOUT;
01631     handle->state          = spidrvStateIdle;
01632 
01633     if ( handle->userCallback != NULL )
01634     {
01635       handle->userCallback( handle,
01636                             ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_TIMEOUT,
01637                             handle->transferCount - handle->remaining );
01638     }
01639   }
01640 }
01641 #endif
01642 
01643 /***************************************************************************/
01646 static void StartReceiveDMA( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01647                              void *buffer,
01648                              int count,
01649                              SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )
01650 {
01651   void *rxPort, *txPort;
01652   DMADRV_DataSize_t size;
01653 
01654   handle->blockingCompleted  = false;
01655   handle->transferCount      = count;
01656   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_CLEARRX | USART_CMD_CLEARTX;
01657   handle->userCallback       = callback;
01658 
01659   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01660   {
01661     size = dmadrvDataSize2;
01662   }
01663   else
01664   {
01665     size = dmadrvDataSize1;
01666   }
01667 
01668   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01669   {
01670     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDOUBLE);
01671     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDOUBLE);
01672   }
01673   else
01674   {
01675     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDATA);
01676     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDATA);
01677   }
01678 
01679   // Start receive dma.
01680   DMADRV_PeripheralMemory( handle->rxDMACh,
01681                            handle->rxDMASignal,
01682                            (void*)buffer,
01683                            rxPort,
01684                            true,
01685                            count,
01686                            size,
01687                            RxDMAComplete,
01688                            handle );
01689 
01690   // Start transmit dma.
01691   DMADRV_MemoryPeripheral( handle->txDMACh,
01692                            handle->txDMASignal,
01693                            txPort,
01694                            (void *)&(handle->initData.dummyTxValue),
01695                            false,
01696                            count,
01697                            size,
01698                            NULL,
01699                            NULL );
01700 }
01701 
01702 /***************************************************************************/
01705 static void StartTransferDMA( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01706                               const void *txBuffer,
01707                               void *rxBuffer,
01708                               int count,
01709                               SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )
01710 {
01711   void *rxPort, *txPort;
01712   DMADRV_DataSize_t size;
01713 
01714   handle->blockingCompleted  = false;
01715   handle->transferCount      = count;
01716   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_CLEARRX | USART_CMD_CLEARTX;
01717   handle->userCallback       = callback;
01718 
01719   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01720   {
01721     size = dmadrvDataSize2;
01722   }
01723   else
01724   {
01725     size = dmadrvDataSize1;
01726   }
01727 
01728   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01729   {
01730     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDOUBLE);
01731     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDOUBLE);
01732   }
01733   else
01734   {
01735     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDATA);
01736     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDATA);
01737   }
01738 
01739   // Start receive dma.
01740   DMADRV_PeripheralMemory( handle->rxDMACh,
01741                            handle->rxDMASignal,
01742                            rxBuffer,
01743                            rxPort,
01744                            true,
01745                            count,
01746                            size,
01747                            RxDMAComplete,
01748                            handle );
01749 
01750   // Start transmit dma.
01751   DMADRV_MemoryPeripheral( handle->txDMACh,
01752                            handle->txDMASignal,
01753                            txPort,
01754                            (void*)txBuffer,
01755                            true,
01756                            count,
01757                            size,
01758                            NULL,
01759                            NULL );
01760 }
01761 
01762 /***************************************************************************/
01765 static void StartTransmitDMA( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01766                                const void *buffer,
01767                                int count,
01768                                SPIDRV_Callback_t callback )
01769 {
01770   void *rxPort, *txPort;
01771   DMADRV_DataSize_t size;
01772 
01773   handle->blockingCompleted  = false;
01774   handle->transferCount      = count;
01775   handle->initData.port->CMD = USART_CMD_CLEARRX | USART_CMD_CLEARTX;
01776   handle->userCallback       = callback;
01777 
01778   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01779   {
01780     size = dmadrvDataSize2;
01781   }
01782   else
01783   {
01784     size = dmadrvDataSize1;
01785   }
01786 
01787   if ( handle->initData.frameLength > 8 )
01788   {
01789     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDOUBLE);
01790     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDOUBLE);
01791   }
01792   else
01793   {
01794     rxPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->RXDATA);
01795     txPort = (void *)&(handle->initData.port->TXDATA);
01796   }
01797 
01798   // Receive DMA runs only to get precise numbers for SPIDRV_GetTransferStatus()
01799   // Start receive dma.
01800   DMADRV_PeripheralMemory( handle->rxDMACh,
01801                            handle->rxDMASignal,
01802                            &(handle->dummyRx),
01803                            rxPort,
01804                            false,
01805                            count,
01806                            size,
01807                            RxDMAComplete,
01808                            handle );
01809 
01810   // Start transmit dma.
01811   DMADRV_MemoryPeripheral( handle->txDMACh,
01812                            handle->txDMASignal,
01813                            txPort,
01814                            (void*)buffer,
01815                            true,
01816                            count,
01817                            size,
01818                            NULL,
01819                            NULL );
01820 }
01821 
01822 /***************************************************************************/
01825 static Ecode_t TransferApiBlockingPrologue( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01826                                             void *buffer,
01827                                             int count )
01828 {
01829   if ( handle == NULL )
01830   {
01831     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
01832   }
01833 
01834   if (( buffer == NULL ) || ( count == 0 )|| ( count > DMADRV_MAX_XFER_COUNT ))
01835   {
01836     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01837   }
01838 
01839   INT_Disable();
01840   if ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle )
01841   {
01842     INT_Enable();
01843     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_BUSY;
01844   }
01845   handle->state = spidrvStateTransferring;
01846   INT_Enable();
01847 
01848   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01849 }
01850 
01851 /***************************************************************************/
01854 static Ecode_t TransferApiPrologue( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle,
01855                                     void *buffer,
01856                                     int count )
01857 {
01858   if ( handle == NULL )
01859   {
01860     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_ILLEGAL_HANDLE;
01861   }
01862 
01863   if (( buffer == NULL ) || ( count == 0 ) || ( count > DMADRV_MAX_XFER_COUNT ))
01864   {
01865     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_PARAM_ERROR;
01866   }
01867 
01868   INT_Disable();
01869   if ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle )
01870   {
01871     INT_Enable();
01872     return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_BUSY;
01873   }
01874   handle->state = spidrvStateTransferring;
01875   INT_Enable();
01876 
01877   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01878 }
01879 
01880 /***************************************************************************/
01883 static void WaitForTransferCompletion( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle )
01884 {
01885   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01886   {
01887     /* Interrupts are already disabled. */
01888     while ( handle->blockingCompleted == false )
01889     {
01890 #if defined( DMA_PRESENT ) && ( DMA_COUNT == 1 )
01891       DMA_IRQHandler();
01892 #elif defined( LDMA_PRESENT ) && ( LDMA_COUNT == 1 )
01893       LDMA_IRQHandler();
01894 #else
01895 #error "No valid DMA engine defined."
01896 #endif
01897     }
01898     INT_Enable();
01899   }
01900   else
01901   {
01902     INT_Enable();
01903     while ( handle->blockingCompleted == false );
01904   }
01905 }
01906 
01907 #if defined( EMDRV_SPIDRV_INCLUDE_SLAVE )
01908 /***************************************************************************/
01911 static Ecode_t WaitForIdleLine( SPIDRV_Handle_t handle )
01912 {
01913   while ( !GPIO_PinInGet( (GPIO_Port_TypeDef)handle->csPort, handle->csPin )
01914           && ( handle->state != spidrvStateIdle ) );
01915 
01916   if ( handle->state == spidrvStateIdle )
01917   {
01918     return handle->transferStatus;
01919   }
01920 
01921   return ECODE_EMDRV_SPIDRV_OK;
01922 }
01923 #endif
